---
description: 'Learn how to request funds from the faucet to an account output.'

  - get funds

import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs';
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';

# Request Funds From the Faucet

## Example Code

<Tabs groupId="language" queryString>
<TabItem value="rust" label="Rust">

1. Instantiate a [Wallet](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html) and [sync it](../wallet/check-balance.mdx).
2. Retrieve the first [`AccountId`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/types/block/output/account/struct.AccountId.html) from the
    [`Balance`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/types/struct.Balance.html) by calling
    the [`Balance.accounts()`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/types/struct.Balance.html#method.accounts) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/account_output/request_funds.rs#L41
```

</div>

3. Get the [`AccountAddress`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/types/block/address/struct.AccountAddress.html)
    for the `AccountId` that was retrieved in step 2, and transform it to Bech32 using the
    [`AccountAddress.toBech32()`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/types/block/address/account/struct.AccountAddress.html#method.to_bech32)
    function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/account_output/request_funds.rs#L45
```

</div>

4. Request funds from the faucet by calling the [`Utils.request_funds_from_faucet()`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/client/utils/fn.request_funds_from_faucet.html)
    function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/account_output/request_funds.rs#L46
```

</div>
</TabItem>
<TabItem value="typescript-node" label="Typescript (Node.js)">

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/classes/Wallet) and [sync it](../wallet/check-balance.mdx).
2. Retrieve the first [`AccountOutput`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/classes/AccountOutput/) from the
    [`Balance`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/interfaces/Balance/) by accessing
    the [`Balance.accounts](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/interfaces/Balance/#accounts) property.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/account_output/request-funds.ts#L38
```

</div>

3. Get the [`AccountAddress`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/classes/AccountAddress/)
    for the `AccountId` that was retrieved in step 2, and transform it to Bech32 using the
    [`Utils.accountIdToBech32()`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/classes/Utils/#accountidtobech32)
    function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/account_output/request-funds.ts#L44-L47
```

</div>

4. Request funds from the faucet by calling the [`Client.requestFundsFromFaucet()`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/classes/Client/#requestfundsfromfaucet)
function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/account_output/request-funds.ts#L49-L52
```

</div>

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="python" label="Python">

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/) and [sync it](../wallet/check-balance.mdx).
2. Retrieve the first [`AccountOutput`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/types/output/#accountoutput-objects) from the
    [`Balance`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/types/balance/) by accessing
    the `Balance.accounts` attribute.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/account_output/request_funds.py#L26
```

</div>

3. Get the [`AccountAddress`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/types/address/#accountaddress-objects)
for the `AccountId` that was retrieved in step 2, and transform it to Bech32 using the
[`Utils.account_id_to_bech32()`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/utils/#account_id_to_bech32)
function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/account_output/request_funds.py#L30-L31
```

</div>

4. Request funds from the faucet by calling the [`Client.request_funds_from_faucet()`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/client/_utils/#request_funds_from_faucet)
function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/account_output/request_funds.py#L32-L33
```

</div>

</TabItem>
</Tabs>
